name: NumberSnake
0:
”Alexa open number snake”
”Alexa play number snake”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: number snake
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Mini Games.

Ready for the sssssssensational game that will put your memory skills to the ultimate test? Join the hungry number snake as it guides you through a sequence of numbers that you must recall in the correct order. How far can you ssssssslither before the numbers slip away?

With each successful round, the game gets harder by adding more numbers to the sequence.

But beware! If you stumble and provide incorrect numbers, the snake won't be pleased. Keep your focus sharp and stay on your toes to avoid the wrath of our sssssslithery friend!

Challenge yourself to beat your high score!

This skill is part of Mini Games.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
